data.text: While exploring the village outskirts, you hear some quiet, overlapping snoring. It doesn't take long to trace the source to a flickering campfire built inside one of the houses where the roof has caved in. A group of clothes gremlins snooze around the fire, with a lone, unfortunately attentive guard keeping lookout.

Most of the gremlins sleep in or on piles of clothing, as you would expect, but one of them seems to have acquired a beautiful, fluffy pillow somewhat recently - it's not even that dirty yet. If you had something like that, your rests on the train could be more effective...

But then again, you'd have to fight the gremlins for it; there's no way they would simply give it up. Maybe you don't care to risk the odds of a five-on-one battle, or maybe you don't want to steal what sparse comfort this little guy has managed to gather. Clothes gremlins must have it tough, too.
In any case, you'll only get one shot at this; they'll have surely moved on by the time you return later.

text: You leave them to their rest and continue on your way.
